description: Maintains and sets the state of an air conditioner's fan

airPurifierFanMode.label: air purifier fan state
airPurifierFanMode.description: The current mode of the air purifier fan, an enum of auto, low, medium, high, sleep, quiet or windFree

supportedAirPurifierFanModes.label: supported air purifier fan modes
supportedAirPurifierFanModes.description: Supported states for this air purifier fan to be in

setAirPurifierFanMode.description: Set the air purifier fan's mode
